lines: 1. For God so loved us, He sent the Saviour:For God so loved us, and loves me too.
Refrain : Love so unending! I'll sing His praises, God loves His children, loves even me.
2. He sent the Saviour, the blest Redeemer; He sent the Saviour to set me free.
3. He bade me welcome, O word of mercy; He bade me welcome, O voice divine.
4. Glory and honour, O Love eternal, To Him be given while life shall last.
